This app was developed using Kotlin and Android SDK. Key technologies used include:

 1. Google Maps API: For displaying beach locations and providing navigation.

 2. MOSDAC API: For retrieving real-time weather and oceanic conditions.

 3. Firebase: For backend services, including real-time data and user authentication.

1. Indian National Centre for Ocean Information Services (INCOIS)

 INCOIS provides critical oceanographic and environmental data. Key Parameters: Drifting Buoy Program, Wave Rider Buoy.


- Key Parameters Studied: Drifting Buoy Program, Wave Rider Buoy

 - Drifting Buoy Data: Provides data on surface currents, atmospheric pressure, and sea surface temperature via Argos satellite systems.

 - Wave Rider Buoy Data: Measures wave height, direction, and period for various coastal locations.


2. MOSDAC - Meteorological and Oceanographic Satellite Data Archival Centre

 MOSDAC, an initiative by the Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO), serves as a portal for satellite data related to meteorology and oceanography.
